languages.text: "Больше мы к этому разговору не вернемся. С моей точки зрения теперь Лорд-капитану будет полезнее сосредоточиться на своих прямых обязанностях, чем продолжать пережевывать прошлое".
"We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."
languages.original_text: "Больше мы к этому разговору не вернемся. С моей точки зрения теперь Лорд-капитану будет полезнее сосредоточиться на своих прямых обязанностях, чем продолжать пережевывать прошлое".

traits.locale_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No volveremos a hablar de eso. Tal y como yo lo veo, sería mejor que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se concentrase en sus obligaciones más perentorias en vez de seguir dándole vueltas a lo que ya no tiene remedio».
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: «No volveremos a hablar de eso. Tal y como yo lo veo, sería mejor que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se concentrase en sus obligaciones más perentorias en vez de seguir dándole vueltas a lo que ya no tiene remedio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「この件についてはこれで終わりにしよう。多忙なロード・キャプテンは、過去のことにこだわるより当面の職務に専念したほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: 「この件についてはこれで終わりにしよう。多忙なロード・キャプテンは、過去のことにこだわるより当面の職務に専念したほうがいい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这件事情我们不要再讨论了。在我看来，领主舰长最好把注意力集中在{mf|他|她}当前的职责上，不要继续沉湎于过去的事情。”
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情我们不要再讨论了。在我看来，领主舰长最好把注意力集中在{mf|他|她}当前的职责上，不要继续沉湎于过去的事情。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne reviendrons plus sur cette question. Il me semble que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ferait mieux de se concentrer sur les tâches qui l'attendent au lieu de continuer à ressasser le passé. »
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne reviendrons plus sur cette question. Il me semble que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ferait mieux de se concentrer sur les tâches qui l'attendent au lieu de continuer à ressasser le passé. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir werden nicht wieder darüber sprechen. In meinen Augen täte der Lord Captain gut daran, sich auf seine unmittelbaren Pflichten zu konzentrieren, anstatt über die Vergangenheit nachzugrübeln."
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden nicht wieder darüber sprechen. In meinen Augen täte der Lord Captain gut daran, sich auf seine unmittelbaren Pflichten zu konzentrieren, anstatt über die Vergangenheit nachzugrübeln."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

languages.text: "Bu konuyu bir daha açmayacağız. Lord Kaptan dediğin, bitmiş gitmiş mevzulara bu kadar takılmaz. İleriye, vazifesine odaklanır."
languages.original_text: "We will not discuss this again. As I see it, the Lord Captain would do better to focus on {mf|his|her} immediate duties than to continue ruminating on what is past."

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuyu bir daha açmayacağız. Lord Kaptan dediğin, bitmiş gitmiş mevzulara bu kadar takılmaz. İleriye, vazifesine odaklanır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
